title-group.article-title: THE HIGHEST ORDER SUPERCONVERGENCE FOR BI-k DEGREE RECTANGULAR ELEMENTS AT NODES: A PROOF OF 2k-CONJECTURE

abstract.p: We proved the highest order superconvergence (u - u h )(z) = O(h 2k ) |ln h| at nodes z, based on Element Orthogonality Analysis (EOA), correction techniques and tensor product, where u ∊ W 2k,∞ (Ω) is the solution for the Poisson equation -∆u = f in a rectangle Ω, u = 0 on Γ, and ${u_h} \in S_0^h$ is its bi-k degree rectangular finite element approximation. This conclusion is also verified by numerical experiments for k = 4, 5.
